changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "user" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "password_hash" TEXT NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "wallet_address" CHAR(42) NULL, "wallet_verified_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "wallet_seed_encrypted" TEXT NULL, "kyc_status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'NONE', "kyc_verified_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "two_factor_enabled" BOOLEAN NOT NULL, "language" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "timezone" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), UNIQUE ("email"), UNIQUE ("wallet_address") );
